Title: Bravo Virtuoso
Actors: Samvel Tadevosian, Maria Akhmetzyanova, Arman Navasardyan, Rudolph Ghevondyan
Plot: Alik, a young virtuoso clarinetist of a classical orchestra is forced to accept contracts intended for a hired killer, called the Virtuoso to save his orchestra. But Alik is a musician, not a murderer.
